data.name: labelDivision.Help
data.value: Select a division from a tree to display it's employees.

data.name: labelIncludeSubdivisions.Help
data.value: Check to include employees from all subordinate divisions.

data.name: labelIncludeSubdivisions.Help
data.value: Select a sort type from the list to use with this module.

data.name: labelPhotoWidth.Help
data.value: Enter photo width in pixels, or leave empty to use original photo size.

data.name: labelDataCacheInfo.Text
data.value:
Important note about module caching:
This module uses its own custom data cache, so it is recommended to disable module cache on a "Page Settings" tab, and then set appropriate cache duration (in seconds) in a "Data Cache Duration" field below.

data.name: labelDataCacheTime.Help
data.value: Enter data cache duration in seconds. Leave empty or set to 0 to disable module data cache.
